products.sum_assured: Daily benefit up to P1000, with maximum 105 days per person (total potential P105,000 per person)
key_features: Daily cash benefit for hospital stays (P100-P1000 per day)
Family cover option (main member, spouse, up to 4 children)
Double daily payout for ICU stays
Additional lump sum (5x daily benefit) if hospitalized >21 days
Cash reward every 3 years whether claimed or not
Cover in Botswana and South Africa
Multiple claims allowed up to 105 days total
products.exclusions: Pregnancy-related claims limited to 5x daily benefit (no additional lump sum); specific conditions require minimum 7+ day stay (influenza, bronchitis, kidney infections, gastric issues, headaches/migraines, laryngitis, sinusitis, pharyngitis, fibromyalgia, chronic fatigue, back injury); not a substitute for medical aid
